Contact Markham Park
Do you have questions, comments, feedback or need help with the site? We’re here to help! Contact us using the form below and we will respond as soon as possible!
[caldera_form id=”CF5ccaf2b73ba36″]
Markham Park FAQ
What is Markham Park?
Markham Park is a 666-acre park located in Sunrise, Florida. It is a popular destination for outdoor recreation and features a variety of amenities, including campgrounds, picnic areas, hiking trails, and a shooting range.
What are the park hours for Markham Park?
Markham Park is open seven days a week from 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. During the summer months, the park may remain open later to accommodate evening events.
What activities are available at Markham Park?
Markham Park offers a range of outdoor activities, including camping, hiking, biking, fishing, boating, and picnicking. The park also features a shooting range, a dog park, and a nature center.
Is there a fee to enter Markham Park?
Yes, there is a fee to enter Markham Park. The fee is $1.50 per person on weekdays and $2.00 per person on weekends and holidays. There is also a fee for certain activities, such as camping and shooting range use.
Can I bring my dog to Markham Park?
Yes, you can bring your dog to Markham Park. The park features a designated off-leash dog park where you can let your dog run and play. Dogs are also allowed on-leash in other areas of the park.
Are there any campgrounds at Markham Park?
Yes, Markham Park features a 29-site campground that is open year-round. The campground offers both tent and RV camping, with amenities such as electricity, water, and restroom facilities.
Can I fish at Markham Park?
Yes, fishing is allowed in Markham Park. The park features several lakes and waterways where you can fish for a variety of freshwater species. A Florida fishing license is required for all anglers.
Are there any hiking trails at Markham Park?
Yes, Markham Park features several hiking trails that range in difficulty from easy to moderate. The trails offer opportunities to explore the park’s natural areas and wildlife.
Can I rent a boat at Markham Park?
Yes, you can rent a boat at Markham Park. The park features a boat rental facility where you can rent kayaks, canoes, and paddleboards. Private boats are also allowed on the park’s lakes.
Is there a nature center at Markham Park?
Yes, Markham Park features a nature center that offers educational programs and exhibits on the park’s flora, fauna, and history. The nature center is open to the public and is free to enter.
